definition: foreign lands and places (idiom); living as expatriate

sentences.english: How many died on foreign soil?
sentences.chinese: 有多少人死在了異國他鄉？

sentences.english: You are more aware of that you are a Chinese only when you're living abroad.
sentences.chinese: 生活在異國他鄉，才更能認識到自己是一箇中國人。

sentences.english: He doesn't have any real friends here.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏他異國什麼真正的朋儕。

sentences.english: Their sense of solidarity is deepened by the loneliness of being in a foreign country.
sentences.chinese: 他們的團結意識由於深處異國他鄉而更加深化了。

sentences.english: Sukh Sagar Indian Restaurant serves exotic Vegetarian Cuisine from India.
sentences.chinese: Sukh薩加爾印度餐廳印度提供異國情調的素食。

sentences.english: It is difficult to readjust ourselves to life in a foreign country in a short time.
sentences.chinese: 我們要想在短期內重新適應異國的生活是不容易的。

sentences.english: Scrumptious Cakes make an exotic Thanksgiving Gift for dear ones.
sentences.chinese: 美味的蛋糕是一份充滿異國情調的禮物。

sentences.english: You are an ignorant foreign people, so how can the Chinese misplacing rhetoric.
sentences.chinese: 你一個無知的異國人，憑什麼在中國亂放厥詞。

sentences.english: The exotic taste of chicken liver & onions with water melon.
sentences.chinese: 帶有異國風味的雞肝和洋蔥加上西瓜。

sentences.english: It sounded both familiar and exotic, feminine yet strong.
sentences.chinese: 聽來情切又不失異國風情，柔情似水又堅強有力。

sentences.english: Will you fall in love with a foreigner?
The exchange of your love's faithful vow(voto fedele)for mine.
sentences.chinese: 羅密歐你還異國把你的愛情的忠厚的盟誓跟我互換。

sentences.english: " Mao and the natural and exotic " girl " in this exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 毛島的自然和異國情調的女孩在這個畫廊。

sentences.english: “I was thinking more in terms of a fancy French restaurant, ” I replied.
sentences.chinese: “我更多想到的是異國情調的法國飯店，”我回答說。

sentences.english: Want something a bit more exotic?
Marriagesomeone fromdifferent country does require some extra effort.
sentences.chinese: 和異國他鄉人結婚真需要更多努力。

definition: to go abroad/to leave the country/emigration
foreign land/away from one's native place
blind date/arranged interview to evaluate a proposed marriage partner (Taiwan pr. [xiang4 qin1])/to be deeply attached to each other
to be in a tangle/to nag
to be in contact (with sb)/to associate/to interact/to get along (well, poorly)
to return to one's home country
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
